# eslintrc-up

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![Build Status][travis-image]][travis-url]
[![js-standard-style][standard-image]][standard-url]

> Find closest eslint config.

## Install

```bash
npm install eslintrc-up --save
```

## API

##### eslintrcUp.sync([options])
